select 
ld.prospectcode,
(select g.description from qc_master.qm_geo g where g.geoid=ld.branch) branch,
(select replace(trim(u.userfname ||' '|| u.usermname ||' '|| u.userlname),'  ',' ') 

from qc_user_auth.qm_user u where u.userid=ld.createdby) createdby,
(select replace(trim(u.userfname ||' '|| u.usermname ||' '|| u.userlname),'  ',' ') 

from qc_user_auth.qm_user u where u.userid=ld.updateby) as "updated by"
from  qc_los.qt_loandetail ld where ld.prospectid in (
1000095614,
1000095461,
1000095456,
1000095056,
1000094816,
1000094691,
1000094657,
1000094638,
1000094564,
1000094472,
1000094471,
1000094446,
1000094413,
1000094402,
1000094399,
1000094377,
1000094222,
1000094140,
1000094130,
1000094127,
1000094096,
1000094057,
1000093997,
1000093976,
1000093974,
1000093970,
1000093897,
1000093876,
1000093856,
1000093789,
1000093753,
1000093743,
1000093716,
1000093623,
1000093611,
1000093610,
1000093606,
1000093581,
1000093574,
1000093554,
1000093533,
1000093531,
1000093483,
1000093468,
1000093448,
1000093445,
1000093435,
1000093422,
1000093394,
1000093364,
1000093301,
1000093282,
1000093204,
1000093200,
1000093147,
1000093144,
1000093142,
1000093134,
1000093131,
1000093112,
1000093090,
1000093082,
1000092998,
1000092990,
1000092983,
1000092961,
1000092950,
1000092929,
1000092914,
1000092836,
1000092833,
1000092795,
1000092794,
1000092687,
1000092625,
1000092606,
1000092600,
1000092515,
1000092478,
1000092395,
1000092365,
1000092356,
1000092328,
1000092200,
1000092101,
1000092020,
1000091932,
1000091875,
1000091857,
1000091745,
1000091724,
1000091662,
1000091582,
1000091553,
1000091536,
1000091415,
1000091406,
1000091356,
1000091351,
1000091325,
1000091146,
1000091063,
1000090987,
1000090662,
1000090629,
1000090613,
1000090496,
1000090455,
1000090428,
1000090171,
1000090017,
1000090012,
1000090008,
1000089185,
1000089107,
1000089016,
1000088890,
1000088854,

1000086802,
1000086502,
1000085950)
;
